meta_title: RCA Meaning in 2026: From 5 Whys to AI-Driven Analysis
meta_description: Recurring equipment failures kill productivity. Master the true meaning of RCA and see how Factory AI automates the path from symptom to root cause in 2026.
title: RCA Meaning: The Definitive Guide to Root Cause Analysis in the Age of AI

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot inside a modern manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of reliability engineers and maintenance technicians (wearing hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests) are gathered around a large industrial pump and motor assembly. One technician is holding a tablet (back of device visible only) pointing toward the machine, while another points to a specific component on the motor. In the background, automated conveyor belts and clean industrial machinery are visible. The lighting is professional and bright, highlighting the clean, high-tech nature of modern maintenance. No text or overlays in the image. The atmosphere is collaborative and focused.
